issue.title: Add to baskets affects Joomla DOM element (#system-message-container)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

When adding an item to basket, #system-message-container div is removed (to clear possible previsou error messages).
Problem is: the div is part of the initial DOM of the page, and removing it may affect templates layout.

I propose to fix it by 'emptying' the container instead of removing it.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0
